about_the_game:
HATMAN

                 

About this game

Enter the whimsical world of HATMAN, a 2D pixel art adventure where humor meets dark twists.

Features:

  • Find and Upgrade Weapons: Equip yourself with an array of powerful gear to tackle enemies.

  • Collect Gold: Amass a fortune while journeying through four expansive worlds.

  • Engage in Mortal Combat: Face off against formidable bosses with challenging combat mechanics.

  • Humorous Characters: Meet a cast of quirky characters that bring levity to your adventure.

  • Exploration and Challenges: Discover hidden secrets and take on various challenges along the way.

Storyline:

Return the four enchanted hats to your homeland while evading a mysterious bunny rabbit, who seems hell-bent on ruining your day. Can you overcome the obstacles and restore peace to your land?

HATMAN is sure to scratch that itch for an engaging, combat-filled platformer with a unique twist!

Tails of Usagi:

In a realm of pixels and sprites so bright, Where HATMAN embarks on his daring flight, Through four vibrant worlds, his quest unfolds, For stolen hats, his journey bold.

Enemies lurk with a cunning grin, And the shadows of a stalker, thin. But HATMAN’s heart, both brave and true, Will guide him through each perilous hue.

With every leap and every bound, In search of hats, new friends are found. Through darkened twists and looming fright, HATMAN’s courage shines the light.

So join this tale, this epic quest, Where bravery and hope are put to test. For in each pixel, a story’s spun, Of HATMAN’s race till the journey's won.

MASH BUTTONS?

                                When everything else fails, mash buttons to wallop the bad guys.

Solo Developer:

Hi everyone! My name is Ninjacostar, and I am thrilled to introduce myself as a solo developer working on my very first game, HATMAN, which will be available on Steam. This project has been an incredible adventure, full of challenges, learning experiences, and a lot of joy/pain.

Creating HATMAN has been a dream come true. From conceptualizing the game mechanics to designing the characters and bringing the world of HATMAN to life, every step has been a labor of love. As a solo dev, I’ve had the unique opportunity to pour my heart and soul into every pixel and line of code. It's been incredibly fulfilling to see my ideas take shape and become something tangible that I can share with all of you.

I am deeply passionate about crafting a game that resonates with players, offering both fun and unexpected depth. The journey of developing HATMAN has not only honed my skills but also brought a profound sense of satisfaction. I am eagerly looking forward to sharing HATMAN with the world and can't wait to see how players will react to the adventure I've created.

Thank you for being a part of this exciting chapter in my life.

Regards: The Ninjacostar.

name: HATMAN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7470, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: HATMAN is a charming 2D action platformer with an edge. Players will traverse four unique worlds in a quest to reclaim four stolen hats. Along the way, they'll face not only cunning adversaries but also a shadowy stalker intent on derailing their adventure.
